title: Johny101010
author: Johny101010
content: I have a MSI Mech 5500 xt 8 gig that I can't seem to properly overclock to save my life. I have it on a rig on HiveOS and everytime I set anything other than 1050 core and 890 memory it crashes. Can someone give me some decent idea how to overclock this thing?  I am getting 25MH and it makes me mad I can't maximize my cards lol.

comments.author: 5W-KILO
comments.body: Are you using the 4GB RX 5500XT or the 8GB variants? Also use GPU-Z to check which Memory chip is installed in the GPU, Micron, Samsung?Make sure your AMD driver is up to date in hiveOS.Use different miners but I found Teamred miner to be the best for AMD GPUs.

comments.author: VasilyS
comments.body: I had troubles while overclocking RX5500 in Linux-based systems. You can do it with UPP (Uplift Power Play) software. Much easier to use Windows and MorePowerTool (MPT). There is an article about it here: https://www.cryptoprofi.info/?p=7509

comments.author: Johny101010
comments.body: Quote from: 5W-KILO on May 13, 2022, 06:58:42 AMAre you using the 4GB RX 5500XT or the 8GB variants? Also use GPU-Z to check which Memory chip is installed in the GPU, Micron, Samsung?Make sure your AMD driver is up to date in hiveOS.Use different miners but I found Teamred miner to be the best for AMD GPUs.Using TRM, latest and updated.  8Gig Micron. Tried Phoenix and NBminer same results. Anything above 890 on Memory it crashes.

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: Quote from: Johny101010 on May 13, 2022, 06:25:07 PMQuote from: 5W-KILO on May 13, 2022, 06:58:42 AMAre you using the 4GB RX 5500XT or the 8GB variants? Also use GPU-Z to check which Memory chip is installed in the GPU, Micron, Samsung?Make sure your AMD driver is up to date in hiveOS.Use different miners but I found Teamred miner to be the best for AMD GPUs.Using TRM, latest and updated.  8Gig Micron. Tried Phoenix and NBminer same results. Anything above 890 on Memory it crashes. The Micron 5500XT are less performing out of the other RX5500XT, I guess no one told you that before buying, the higher I have seen is 27MH sorry pal 1150 core 950 memory = 27MH on ETH If yours cant get over 890 then its your luck....

I have it on a rig on HiveOS and everytime I set anything other than 1050 core and 890 memory it crashes. Try different options from this forumhttps://hiveon.com/forum/t/rx-5500-xt-settings-whats-your-hashrates/27198/18Check out this forum in Russianhttps://miningclub.info/threads/gajd-po-razgonu-pamjati-na-rx5500xt-vyshe-960.72505/Need to increase memory to 960
